name: spawn-playground
description: Source code of Spawn Playground website and backend

scripts.build-ts: cd ./www && npm ci && npm run build
scripts.watch-ts: cd ./www && npm ci && npm run watch
scripts.build: npm run build-ts && npm run mkdir-bin && v server -o ./server/bin/server
scripts.build-prod: npm run build-ts && npm run mkdir-bin && v server -prod -o ./server/bin/server
scripts.local-build: npm run build-ts && npm run mkdir-bin && v -g -d local -d uselibbacktrace -o ./server/bin/server ./server
